page.title: 20Education in Warton
page.content: The school serves boys and girls aged 5-11. A school bus brings in from Borwick, Priest Hutton & Tewitfield. Millhead children choose between Warton or Carnforth's 3 schools. In 1985 56 entries at Morecambe Musical Festival gained 56 awards in Ensemble, Sight Reading, Recitation, Dualogues & Story Telling inc. 3 1sts., 4 2nds.,5 3rds. & 44 Merits. In recent years Adult Education helped the Warton Bowls Club's last 6 members make a new start. They now flourish in Division I. DOMESDAY Information by children, parents & teachers of Archbishop Hutton's School, Warton, Carnforth, with the assistance of local organisations. Land survey by Warton families. Photographs by School Governor, Coun. G.W.Price. Headmaster & Adult Educ. Centre Head: Malcolm Dilley,FCollP.,FVCM.
